section.title: Cell Types
section.para: A model's unit cell is, at any given time, one of the following:

row.entry: The model has no unit cell (i.e. it is non-periodic)
The model's unit cell is cubic, with A=B=C and alpha=beta=gamma=90
The model's unit cell is an orthorhombus, with any cell lengths and alpha=beta=gamma=90
The model's unit cell is monoclinic or triclinic, with any cell lengths and angles
